files.description: End-to-end QA runner that executes a minimal smoke test first, captures full stdout/stderr into canonical artifacts under outputs/qa/exec_logs/, detects failure signatures, performs automatic retry, and writes an environment dump (container image hash, resources, dependency versions) on retry-triggered failures.

files.description: Dockerfile that installs project dependencies and provides a consistent container environment for running the QA smoke test and full QA pipeline.
Container entrypoint that invokes the QA runner with sensible defaults and ensures logs and environment dumps are written under outputs/qa/exec_logs/.
